In New York City, 2026 begins with a tragic shooting incident involving an Uber driver, record-high flu hospitalizations, and a significant cold snap with potential snow, while Mayor Mamdani revokes previous executive orders and nurses threaten strikes amid ongoing contract negotiations.

### Risks & Alerts

- Uber driver shot and pedestrian killed in NYC's first murder and traffic deaths of 2026.
